search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Hootsuite (hootsuite.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for Hootsuite's pricing page is [https://www.hootsuite.com/plans](https://www.hootsuite.com/plans)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
| Legend
checkmarkIncluded with plan

close2Not included with plan

\* Available with multiple users

 | Standard

$99per user/month, billed annually

[Free 30-day trial](https://hootsuite.com/billing/create-account?plan=STANDARD&defaultBillingInterval=annual)





 | Most popular

Advanced

$249per user/month, billed annually

[Free 30-day trial](https://hootsuite.com/billing/create-account?plan=ADVANCED&defaultBillingInterval=annual)





 | Enterprise

Contact for pricing

[Request a Demo](https://www.hootsuite.com/request-demo)





 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 

General
-------

 |
| 

Connect accounts to publish, schedule, and manage all your content in one place.



 | 5

 | Unlimited

 | Unlimited

| 

The number of users that can collaborate within your Hootsuite account.



 | 1+

 | 1+

 | 5+

| 

Enable employee collaboration, streamline workflows, and manage permissions.

Includes departmental organization\*

Includes departmental organization\*

 | Includes schedule posts across networks

|

 |

Let AI generate engaging captions for every social media network, repurpose top-performing posts, and automatically create content for holidays.

 | Includes ai content and ideas generator

 |

Enhance and refine posts with AI (OwlyWriter). Fix spelling and grammar, optimize the length of your caption, change the tone, or make your post actionable.

Hootsuite offers three plan options: Standard, Advanced, and Enterprise. Plans are available for individuals, small teams, and large businesses.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing varies by user count and features included in each tier.

features: Connect accounts to publish, schedule, and manage content

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Most popular plan with advanced features.
